meanings.definition: One side of a sheet of paper in a book, magazine, etc.
meanings.sent1: She carefully turned the pages of her favorite storybook.
meanings.sent2: The pages of the magazine were filled with colorful pictures.
meanings.sent3: The pages of the book seemed to whisper stories as she turned them.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a book with pages waiting to be explored by curious readers.
meanings.sent5: The pages of the old diary held secrets of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: The written or printed material contained on a page.
meanings.sent1: The pages of the textbook were filled with interesting facts.
meanings.sent2: She read the pages of the letter with a smile on her face.
meanings.sent3: The pages of the menu tempted her with delicious descriptions.
meanings.sent4: His words painted vivid pictures on the pages of her imagination.
meanings.sent5: The pages of the novel transported her to a different world.

meanings.definition: To turn the pages of a book or document.
meanings.sent1: He pages through the report to find the important details.
meanings.sent2: She carefully pages through the old photo album, reminiscing about the past.
meanings.sent3: The wind playfully pages through the pages of the open book.
meanings.sent4: Time pages through the chapters of our lives, leaving memories in its wake.
meanings.sent5: She pages through the recipe book, searching for the perfect dish to cook.
